name: Jetpack Pixel
description:
A simple platformer made in a couple of hours for the Low Effort Jam 15 

Controls:  Arrow keys to move, Up to use your jetpack

Collect all the coins and reach the end without dying from fall damage!

Note: there's a bug that causes the level number to not go up when you get to the end successfully but that wont affect you. No high scores for you!
